text: Krek may refer to: * Krek (film), a 1968 animated film * Krek (album), a 2005 album by Khold * Janez Evangelist Krek (1865–1917), Slovenian politician, priest, journalist, and author * Miha Krek (1897–1969), Slovenian lawyer and politician * Uroš Krek (1922–2008), Slovenian composer
title: Krek
